post:
Hello,
We've got a new node in North Carolina and here's our new offer, also do note, these will be provisioned only on our North Carolina Node and not on the Kansas node.

All the VPS's come with,
1 Gbit Shared Line
Dedicated RAM 
8 Shared Cores of 2 X L5420 Processors at 2.50 Ghz each core.
1 Static IPv4
SolusVM

OpenVZ Yearly Plan Details :
256 MB Guaranteed RAM
512 MB vSWAP
20 GB HDD
1 TB Bandwidth
Proxmox Control Panel
8 Shared Cores of 2 X L5420 Processors at 2.50 Ghz each core (Each processor has 4 cores, so 2 x 4 = 8)

Order Link :
https://crowncloud.net/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=20

Test File : http://199.241.189.78/100mb.test
Test IP : 199.241.185.243
Location : North Carolina, USA
IPv6 Info : No ETA as yet from the DC, but should be coming soon ;)
Terms And Conditions and Acceptable User Policy of our VPS Hosting Service : http://wiki.crowncloud.net/doku.php?id=vps_tos

Contact us at support@crowncloud.net if you need any pre-sales info or support.
or join us on IRC at #CrownCloud on FreeNode !

All orders are manually processed and may take upto 24 hours for activation, Please use a valid email when signing up as the details of the VPS will be emailed to you, All VPS's come with a 1 Gbit Shared line.

Supported OS for OpenVZ,
CentOS 6
CentOS 5
Debian 6
Ubuntu 11.10
Ubuntu 12.04
or any other template from (http://wiki.openvz.org/Download/template/precreated) but only from the "Precreated section"

Contact us at support@crowncloud.net if you need any pre-sales info or support.
or join us on IRC at #CrownCloud on FreeNode !

Thanks !
